other_tests.findings: Lymphocytosis with mildly elevated myelin basic protein (2.6 ng/mL; normal range, <2.0 ng/mL).
Irregular levator palpebrae contraction activity with incomplete contraction activity during attempts to open eyes.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Post-treatment EMG recordings showed the same activity pattern as pretreatment.

other_tests.findings: PLMS index fell from a mean of 108.7 to 38.4; PLMW index fell from 111.2 to 42.4 after pramipexole treatment.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Significant decrease in PLMS and PLMW indexes after treatment.

other_tests.findings: Disturbed neuromuscular transmission in extensor digitorum communis muscle.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Normal findings during later check-ups after adjustment in treatment.
